events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I am quite disappointed.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer’s message regarding returning the product.
Agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase made by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’d be happy to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is still unused with tags attached to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is #58723, and yes, the jacket is unused and the tags are all intact as you requested.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days using our prepaid return label. Once we receive the item, we will issue a full refund.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I will send it back tomorrow using the label.
We have received the returned jacket, inspected it, and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method shortly.
Just following up to make sure you received your refund and that everything was satisfactory with the return process. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Thank you for reaching out to us. We’re closing this case as resolved, but feel free to contact us anytime if you have more questions or concerns.
